title: Vlatko Andonovski Named Coach of the U.S. Women’s Soccer Team
text:
The next coach of the U.S. women’s soccer team is a man whose teams are used to winning.

Vlatko Andonovski, who led Seattle’s Reign FC to the National Women’s Soccer League playoffs in the past two seasons, will take over the defending two-time World Cup champion national team, the U.S. Soccer Federation announced Monday. The team’s previous coach, Jill Ellis, announced after the World Cup in July that she would leave the team after its five-game victory tour, which ended Oct. 6. The U.S. women have won four World Cups overall.

...
description: Vlatko Andonovski, who led Seattle’s Reign FC to the National Women’s Soccer League playoffs in the past two seasons, will take over as head coach of the U.S. women’s soccer team.
